citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 am on 28
November 2022. Inspector spoke with family member who stated licensee would not be home until late in the day due to
appointments.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 am on 28 
November 2022.  Inspector spoke with family member who stated licensee would not be home until late in the day due to 
appointments. 
 
 
 
End Section
